name: Trial Of The Bumbling Bitches
description:
Join Marisol, Yamila, Mary Jay, and Angelica, the Bronx's resident stoner burn outs. No one believes in them and no takes them seriously...

That is until one day when Fairy shows up out of the blue and tells them its up to them to save the world! Uh..... ok.................

Let's give it out best shot shall we!

[STILL UNDER DEVELOPMENT!!]

Hey This game is still under development so it might have a few kinks to work out. if you run into any bugs or wanna give me any feed back please feel free!

Right now a lot of the backgrounds are missing and some of the character art still needs to be cleaned up.

OH and there are a lot of Typo's! I'll fix those soon. (Rhe title is TRIAL of the bumbling bitches not TRAIL of the bumbling bitches.)

The credits are also missing in the build so I'll add them here for now!

We plan to have this game finished by December 5th 2020.

Thank you for your patience!

[CREDITS]

Backgrounds by Zyncren
